title: (Tobacco Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023))
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco) Act
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco) Act 

2002 (Fixed Payment Notice) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 23rd day of 

September 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited public health (tobacco) act 2002 (fixed payment notice) regulation 2024 (2) regulation shall come operation 23rd day september 2024

title: (Tobacco Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023))
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Act of 2002” means the Public Health (Tobacco) Act 2002 (No. 6 of 2002); 

“Act of 2023” means the Public Health (Tobacco Products and Nicotine Inhaling 
Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023).
text_norm: 2 regulation - act 2002 mean public health (tobacco) act 2002 (no 6 2002) act 2023 mean public health (tobacco product nicotine inhaling products) act 2023 (no 35 2023)

title: (Tobacco Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023))
heading: 3. The form set out in the Schedule is prescribed for the purposes of
text_raw:
3. The form set out in the Schedule is prescribed for the purposes of 
subsection (1) of section 56 of the Act of 2002 in relation to an offence alleged 
to have been committed under section 29 of the Act of 2023.
text_norm: 3 form set schedule prescribed purpose subsection (1) section 56 act 2002 relation offence alleged committed section 29 act 2023

title: (Tobacco Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023))
heading: 4. The amount of €2,000 is prescribed for the purposes of subsection (4) of
text_raw:
4. The amount of €2,000 is prescribed for the purposes of subsection (4) of 
section 56 of the Act of 2002 in relation to an offence alleged to have been 
committed under section 29 of the Act of 2023. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [474] 3 

Regulation 3

title: (Tobacco Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023))
heading: Public Health (Tobacco) Act 2002
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Public Health (Tobacco) Act 2002 

Section 56(1) 

Fixed Payment Notice 

To: ________________________ [insert full name] 

Address: ______________________________________________________ 
[insert address] 

It is alleged that, at ______________________________________________ 
[insert address of place where the offence is alleged to have been committed] on 
____________ 20 ___, at ___________ [insert time] you committed an offence 
under: 

[Provision in the Act providing for the offence] 

Particulars of offence: 

[Description of factual situation constituting the contravention alleged] 

A prosecution in respect of the alleged offence will not be instituted during the 
period of 28 days beginning on the date of this Notice. If, during that period, you 
pay to the Health Service Executive at ________________________________ 

[insert address], the sum of €2,000 accompanied by the original or a copy of this 
Notice, a prosecution will not be instituted at any time in respect of the 
aforementioned alleged offence. 

You are not obliged to make the payment specified in this Notice. However, you 
will be prosecuted for the alleged offence if you do not make payment as 
mentioned above. 

[Signature] ________________________________ 

Authorised Officer _________________________ 

[Date] _____________________ 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [474] 

IMPORTANT: 

should be made 

Payment 
at 
__________________________________________________ [insert address]. 
A receipt will be issued. 

the Health Service Executive 

to 

Refund of a payment made pursuant to this Notice will not be made in any 
circumstance. You are entitled to disregard this Notice and defend the 
prosecution of the alleged offence in court. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 September, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [474] 5

title: (Tobacco Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023))
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prescribe the form of a fixed payment notice under section 56 
(inserted by section 49 of the Public Health (Tobacco Products and Nicotine 
Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023)) of the Public Health (Tobacco) 
Act 2002 (No. 6 of 2002) and the fixed payment payable in respect of the offence 
under section 29 of the Act of 2023. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco) Act 2002 (Fixed 
Payment Notice) Regulations 2024 and come into operation on 23 September
